Text:
anyone the can get this to work ???

Mine freezes and makes a wird sound that continues forever, it hangs when the SIERRA logo fades in the first loading...

I'll let you know. I'm going to try it on PCSX2. If it hangs, then it's obviously an emulator-related problem (I presume that's what you're using). If you're using a modded PS2, then something is seriously wrong with the ISO.
It works.....burned with alcohol 120% at 4x speed.
anyone...seed...please...make me happy :)) And I´ll make Uhappy2!
